New Trier High School provides numerous supports, interventions, and programs to support student mental health and to identify students who may be struggling
New Trier Applied Arts Faculty using 3D printers to create 500 face shields for medical workers.

div.span: Click on the image for information on Locker Retrieval Schedule and Sign-up

New Trier High School is committed to maintaining a safe and respectful learning environment and addressing incidents that impact our campus climate.
You have the following options to report an incidents based on the situation:
Speak with an adult: It is always best to work through a situation with an adult
Call 911: If you believe the safety of someone is at risk
Text-A-Tip is a 24/7 anonymous text-communication system for youth needing immediate mental health assistance for themselves or a friend. Text to: 844-823-5323 Enter Text: TREVHELP
TrevTips: Anonymous communication to New Trier High School: Concerns reported on days when school is not in session, or after regular school hours, will not be seen until the following school day. Click
here
if you wish to submit a tip.

For Summer School 2020 information click
here
.

h5.a: New Trier extends nomination deadline for Alumni Achievement Awards to May 4

div.span: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the nomination deadline for the 2021 New Trier High School Alumni Achievement Awards has been extended from April 6 to Monday, May 4, 2020 by 5 p.m .
